_sText:
Got kinda lazy with the textures... I might do proper textures at some point, but not now, i got some other plans to do.

How to play: Set max Players to max. Make bots to join Terrorist side. Enable all weapons for the bots. Set number of CPU players to MAX (65). Type mp_limitteams 99 in console (it should automatically be enabled). There is no time limit. Don't join to terrorist side. Set bot difficulty to easy or normal.

Max players: 5 CTs and 50 Terrorists.

No plugins needed.
